list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: have a particular opinion, belief, or idea about someone or something.
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: she thought that nothing would be the same again
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Cô nghĩ rằng không có gì sẽ giống nhau một lần nữa

list_definition_mean.definitions_word_en: direct one's mind toward someone or something; use one's mind actively to form connected ideas.

list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_en: I went for a walk to have a think
list_definition_mean.definitions_ex_vn: Tôi đã đi dạo để có một suy nghĩ
